techmeme.title: In April ChatGPT started to, by default, reference all past chats for more personalized responses, but this means users lose control of their prompts' context (Simon Willison/Simon Willison's Weblog)
AI model ranking project LMArena spins off from UC Berkeley and raises a $100M seed led by a16z and UC Investments, sources say at a $600M valuation (Bloomberg)
Sources and docs: a "major lapse" at Thoma Bravo's Opexus, which helps US agencies manage investigations and FOIA, let two convicted hackers delete databases (Jason Leopold/Bloomberg)
Mistral partners with All Hands AI to release Devstral, a model to help with coding, in "research preview" under Apache 2.0, and says it outperforms Gemma 3 27B (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Brazilian researchers scraped 2B+ Discord messages from 3,167 public servers using Discord's public API, covering 2015 to 2024, and publish the messages online (Matthew Gault/404 Media)
